main.name: Sallah Ud Din Sarwar
main.description: 10+ year’s industry experience in designing and developing Object oriented solutions in Multi layered & N-Tired.
main.bio: I am a multi skilled Software Engineer with over 10+ year’s industry experience in designing and developing Object oriented solutions in Multi layered & N-Tired. I have substantial success to my credit. I have consistently handled complex problems to the satisfaction of my clients by working in stressful situations. I enjoy learning and applying new technologies in a dynamic and forward thinking professional environment.

testimonials.text: Mr. Sallah-Ud-Din is very intelligent and dedicated Software Engineer. At the beginning of his career i am impressed that he is not looking fresh. Because his mind think as senior engineer. He have logical mind and he can make solution of every problem in the field of development.
testimonials.user: Zahid Nadeem (Senior Software Engineer at Punjab Information Technology Board)
testimonials.title: Senior Software Engineer

testimonials.text: Sallahudin was an awesome learner and a very good group mate and he was never shy of trying new technologies. He always was a source of inspiration for us to work hard like him.I wish him best of luck for his future plans.
testimonials.user: Waseem Sarwar (Senior Software Developer at Geeks Ltd)
testimonials.title: Senior Software Developer
